channel.title: FLF - Leadership Now Podcast
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: 146: If I were Prime Minister [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
In this episode, Aaron encourages the listeners to take part in a mental exercise by thinking about what you would do if you were elected as your nation's leader! What policies would you enact? What would change? How would you bring your nation back to order and back to God? All of that and more in this episode of Leadership Now with Dr. Aaron Rock!

More Resources:

More resources at Beachhead Media's website: https://beachheadmedia.ca/

item.author: Dr. Aaron Rock, Chris Eelman
item.itunes:author: Dr. Aaron Rock, Chris Eelman

item.title: 145: This Nation will Fall [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
In this episode, Aaron discusses how a modern-day nation begins to fall apart from within and the causes behind it. Listen in this week to discover how we as Christians should respond and how we can play a vital part being the Lord's ambassadors here on Earth.

 

More Resources:
